qa.title: FAQ´s
qa.tab1option1question: How do you differ from other box diets?
qa.tab1option1answer: We believe in an individual approach. Each of us is special and each of us needs a different calorie intake if we want to achieve our goal in a healthy way. The menu will look different for a 50kg woman who wants to lose weight and different for a 90kg man who wants to gain muscle mass. The menu is therefore tailored to your body and goals, which is not taken into account by the ordinary box diet.
qa.tab1option2answer: The menu is compiled by our special algorithm based on the needs of your body and your goals. Our certified nutrition consultant Jiří Kaloč is responsible for the composition of the meals themselves and for your results.
qa.tab1option3question: What does the menu look like?
qa.tab1option3answer: We are in favor of a balanced diet. The meals are so very varied and tasty. The menu consists of 300 different meals, which are regularly rotated. At the same time, we constantly update our database and include new and interesting dishes. With us you don't get tired of the same food.
qa.tab2option1answer: High quality and fresh ingredients are the basis for healthy eating, so we use only premium ingredients from Czech suppliers.
qa.tab2option2answer: Yes, we buy raw materials on the day of cooking. The food is then quenched (from 90°C to 2°C in less than an hour) and hermetically packaged. This ensures maximum freshness.
qa.tab2option3answer: Meals are prepared on the day of delivery. This means that on Sundays we prepare for Monday and Tuesday, Tuesday for Wednesday and Thursday, Thursday for Friday and Saturday.
qa.tab2option4answer: Yes, they are delicious. Plus, exactly per gram calculated to fit your personal diet.
qa.tab3option1question: Do you deliver to the outskirts of Prague?
qa.tab3option1answer: Yes, please do not hesitate to contact us via client line for more details.
qa.tab3option2answer: We deliver food every other day - on Tuesdays, Thursdays and Sundays. Always between 5pm and 10pm. You can specify time within two-hour windows.
qa.tab3option3question: What if I need to change my shipping information?
qa.tab3option3answer: We're flexible, so don't worry about changing your plans. You can change the time or place of delivery until 3 pm on the same day.
qa.tab3option4question: How long in advance do I have to report a skipped delivery?
qa.tab3option4answer: The skipped delivery can only be reported during Customer Support business hours, ie Monday – Friday from 10:00 to 18:00, but no later than 3 full business days prior to delivery. However, the delivery day itself is not counted, ie delivery day minus 3 full business days. This is because for every cooking we buy fresh ingredients for a precise number of customers.
qa.tab3option5question: Can I cancel only one day?
qa.tab3option5answer: If your order covers two days, you can only cancel your entire two-day order. Canceling only one day in this case is not possible.
qa.tab3option6question: How do you set the price?
qa.tab3option6answer: The price is set individually according to the tailor-made diet plan and is derived according to the daily caloric intake for the person and his / her goal. The price will then be different for a woman who wants to lose weight and a man who wants to gain muscle. However, the current average price is around CZK 480 for a five-course daily menu.
qa.tab3option7answer: After placing your order, you will be receive an invoice which is sent to your e-mail for payment
qa.tab4option1question: Does the food needs to be heated?
qa.tab4option1answer: Some meals are intended for cold consumption, others are intended for heating. You can also consume them unheated, but for better taste we recommend warming them up.
qa.tab4option2answer: If you use microwave heating, we recommend piercing holes in the foil. The required cooking time varies according to the type of food and the size of the portion. We recommend using medium power (6000-7000 W) and longer time so the food is heated evenly.
qa.tab4option3answer: We recommend storing food in the refrigerator, but it is not a problem to take it to work or on the road. The food will last several hours outside the refrigerator without any change in taste or quality.
